name: Brainedge
description: Brainedge is the worldâ€™s first AI-powered, tokenised learning platform turning education into a rewarding, gamified, and globally accessible experience. Brainedge integrates a token-based incentive system to address persistent challenges in the e-learning industry, including low user engagement, limited language accessibility, and high content production costs. With 3 million users and over 180,000 lessons completed, Brainedge is building a global Learn-to-Earn ecosystem, where education is not just accessible but financially rewarding. As the e-learning market is projected to surpass $1 trillion by 2032, Brainedge aims to position itself as a market leader, bringing in-demand courses to one billion learners worldwide.
